code: /**  * Include all data  */ public ClusterStateRequestBuilder all() {     request.all().     return this. }
/**  * Do not include any data  */ public ClusterStateRequestBuilder clear() {     request.clear().     return this. }
public ClusterStateRequestBuilder setBlocks(boolean filter) {     request.blocks(filter).     return this. }
